channel.title: flowplayer on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in flowplayer on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Updated Joomla Flowplayer plug-in
item.description: I use flowplayer for joomla quite often. I usually use this plugin: http://extensions.joomla.org/extensions/multimedia/multimedia-players/video-players-a-gallery/7377 Unfortunately it uses an old version of flowplayer. So, since both are GPL I decided to update the plugin and share it. You can download it here: plg_upd_flowplayer_J15_v1-1-0
